title: 川普宣布暂停提供WHO资金
contents:
个人观点，老川普对疫情的反应可以仁者见仁智者见智，不过WHO的责任是无法逃避的，尤其在其他西方国家的断航决策上，谭书记的影响是巨大的。这是一个迟到的决定。

https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/us-politics/trump-who-funding-white-house-press-briefing-today-coronavirus-a9465401.html

The United States is suspending funding to the World Health Organisation while the Trump administration studies what Donald Trump called the group's "disasterous" role in "covering up" the outbreak of the coronavirus in China, the president announced Tuesday evening.

"The reality is the WHO failed to obtain, vet and share information in a timely fashion," Mr Trump said. "The WHO failed in its basic duty and must be held accountable."

"Tremendous amounts of time" were "lost" due to what Mr Trump called the WHO's slowness. He is being accused of ignoring warnings from his own intelligence agencies of the virus's severity, and his own plodding an ineffective response.
